video.title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
video.synopsis: High school sophomore Kusuo Saiki swore as a child that he would keep his psychic talents hidden, but his abilities still make his life difficult.

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo Saiki thought he could have an easy life despite his psychic abilities, but his sophomore year of high school quickly proves him wrong.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo inadvertently makes a brilliant dodgeball play in gym class, putting him on a collision course with his athletic classmates Kineshi and Riki.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo's extrasensory perception makes him unable to enjoy famous illusionist Uryoku Chono's show. Annoyed, Chono dares him to display his own magic.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Young medium Toritsuka Reita, who can see ghosts, asks Kusuo to take him on as a student in ESP, but Reita's motivations are anything but noble.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo changes his routine so that he can get home from school in time to watch anime. His worried friends, meanwhile, are searching all over for him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo heads to the grocery store to buy dessert and has to decide which coffee jelly will give him the most satisfaction. Luckily, he has ESP!
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo isn't a fan of cats or dogs because his telepathy and X-ray vision let him see animals as they really are. Then he meets a cat in a tight spot.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo "overhears" his classmates planning to steal a confiscated item back from a terrifying teacher and has to decide whether or not to rat them out.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Kokomi worries that Kusuo will think she's dating the idol Toru Mugami. When Kusuo's mom becomes Mugami's newest fan, things get complicated.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The day of the sports test in gym class is not Kusuo's favorite. But it's paradise for Hairo and Nendo, who may have finally found worthy opponents.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: No good deed goes unpunished, as Kusuo learns when he retrieves a child named Yuta's balloon with his ESP and Yuta decides he's secretly a superhero.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: As a teleporter, Kusuo doesn't share his classmates' excitement about their class trip. He gets caught up in schemes about trip groups regardless.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo wakes up at the beach to find that the hotel he was supposed to stay at has disappeared. An old sunken ship suddenly appears out of nowhere.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Bespectacled transfer student Aren Kuboyasu decides to use his new surroundings as an opportunity to distance himself from his delinquent past.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: The school festival draws near, and Kusuo's classmate Hairo has a terrible idea: folding 50,000 paper cranes. Everyone else is opposed.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Teruhashi's brother asks Kusuo for a favor about filming in their neighborhood. The next day at school, Teruhashi invites him on a date as an apology.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: On his way to school, Kaido encounters Kuboyasu in the middle of the street. He's stumbled into a revenge plot, but it may be too late to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Teruhashi drops by the Saiki household to get a cooking lesson from Kurumi, but Yuta is extremely suspicious of her, and Kusuo is in over his head.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo and his family visit his mother's parents, the very kind Kumi and the very forbidding Kumagoro, whose bark is much worse than his bite.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo overhears girls gossiping about their crushes on Toritsuka, whose band made a big splash at the school festival, possibly for a sinister reason.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: After Kusuo takes a direct hit from a baseball to his head walking past the field, he realizes one of the control devices on his head is missing.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation approaches. Kusuo can hardly wait for some peace and quiet! However, his calendar quickly fills up with one annoyance after another.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Transfer student Metori Saiko joins the class, but his haughty attitude is as big as his family's fortune. Kusuo wonders if he has an ulterior motive.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo receives an invitation to a magic show featuring Chono and Michael, whose powers have apparently grown prodigiously.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: One week after the events of last season, psychic Kusuo Saiki hopes to return to his normal life. Except, life is very far from normal, as always.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo's parents celebrate their wedding anniversary but he ignores them. The next day, he makes a mistake that puts all of their futures in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Saiki and his friends brave the bitter cold to go to school but it's freezing inside. Just as things look really bad, a warmhearted savior arrives.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Cute new student Imu Rifuta's appearance has the schoolboys psyched up. But Teruhashi stands in the way of her dominance of school cuteness.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Teruhashi may have knocked Rifuta down but she's not out. Sensing that her rival likes Kusuo, she goes after him. Oddly, this is exactly what he wants.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Metori plans a luxurious weekend at his private island, but the yacht taking everyone there has a some (oddly-unforeseen) problems, stranding them.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The classmates are still stuck on the island but manage to complete a raft. Metori demands they decide who will ride and who gets to stay behind.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Sexy student Mikoto Aiura transfers in and impresses everyone with her fortunetelling. Kusuo realizes she may be the real deal and thus his rival.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo's managed to escape identification by Mikoto by hiding his aura, but she's not about to give up on her search for the mysterious "S. K."
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo's grandfather Kumagoro gets a suspicious call asking for money and quickly realizes it's a scam. He asks Kusuo for help with revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Nendo gets a love letter from a freshman coed and Saiki figures it's a prank, but he soon realizes she's serious. Nendo, being Nendo, wants to say no.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: In order to win against school idol Kokomi, Rifuta attempts to profess her love for Kusuo. Nendo's pet hamster wreaks havoc inside the school.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo and Mikoto visit Chisato, who's working new jobs to save up enough money to visit her dad in Puerto Rico. But Mikoto soon divines a surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Forced to survive for 24 hours without relying on his rich family, Metori Saiko enlists the help of Nendo and the others.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo and his friends decide to follow Nendo after hearing that he is going to go help the Baseball Club, which is full of sports manga clichs.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Rifuta begs Kusuo to help her find a suitable boy before she goes absolutely crazy over Kokomi. Self-professed "love-master" Chiyo steps in to help.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo receives an explosive surprise from his brother Kusuke, who has a challenge for him. If Kusuo fails, Kusuke will expose him via firework.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: New student Touma Akechi joins the class but there's something about him that's different from the other transfers, besides his extreme verbosity.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The school festival is coming up and Kusuo's class must pick a boy-girl pair to volunteer, setting the stage for an intense battle of wits.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: After accidentally turning Riki and Shun into stone, Kusuo comes up with a plan to hypnotically substitute them with other friends. Hilarity ensues.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo's grandparents are visiting but get delayed on the way to the house. Luckily, or perhaps unluckily, his friends soon find them and try to help.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: After getting blamed alongside his friends when they cause trouble, Kusuo vows to go home alone the next day. But then Kineshi insists on joining him.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: With Touma about to find out his secret, Kusuo goes back in time to elementary school to keep Touma from even suspecting that Kusuo has psychic powers.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Teruhashi's beauty and kindness are admired by all but her efforts spark some unexpected actions amongst her male classmates, leading to trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: With a school deadline impending, Kusuo and the class discuss their post-graduation plans. Big brother Kusuke makes Kusuo lose control of his body.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kusuo fails to stop his pals from picking a troublesome destination for Spring Break, Oshimai-ken. Later, he faces a soon-to-erupt volcano.
episodes.title: Episode 2
